full_summary:
### Fire Alarm Upgrade at the High Commission of Canada to Australia in Canberra
#### Invitation to Qualify

**Reference Number:** PW-23-01020408
**Solicitation Number:** 23-230160
**Publication Date:** January 6, 2023
**Tender Closing Date:** January 23, 2023, 13:00:00

His Majesty the King in right of Canada, represented by the Department of Foreign Affairs, Trade and Development (DFATD), invites experienced and qualified general contractors to prequalify for the fire alarm upgrade project at the High Commission of Canada to Australia in Canberra.

### Project Overview

The scope of work includes the installation of a complete addressable, electrically supervised, fire detection and alarm system. This will involve the dismantling of the existing conventional system, installation of a new control panel, signal initiating devices, audible/visual notification appliances, wiring, and all necessary accessories to provide a fully operational system.

The project will be delivered using the Bid-Build methodology. Interested suppliers must be capable of providing the required services in English or French and have the ability to travel to and perform commissioning guidance in Canberra, Australia.

**Prequalification Requirements**
To be considered for prequalification, interested suppliers must meet the requirements as outlined in the attachment. A copy of the attachment is available for download at [link](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/01/11/f108a27d1d2a179367d3464b3e1d3b40/rq_23-230160.pdf).

**Trade Agreements**
The following trade agreements apply to this project:

* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement

**Contact Information**

For any inquiries concerning this prequalification process, please contact:
Brent Hygaard
realproperty-contracts@international.gc.ca
343-573-5242
